entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:11 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:11 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
